div.p: INTERACT so as to CAUSE TO BE OR ACT RESEMBLE:as one DESIRES.
1. The most current general word in this group is zhì 制 (ant. zòng 縱 "give free rein to"), which refers to all kinds of control, political, physical, as well as psychological.
2. Zhì 治 refers to the orderly and principled long-term control of something.
3. Yù 御 refers to the exercise of sovereign unchallenged control over.
4. Guǎn 管 and zhǎng 掌 refer to the concrete practical control over something large or small.
5. Shàn 擅 refers to gaining or having unlegitimised sole control of something. See MONOPOLISE
6. Zhuān 專 refers to having sole control, typically of some administrative function. See MONOPOLISE
7. Bà 霸 refers to dominating and controlling something through a supreme display of power. See also RULER
rough draft to BEGIN TO identify synonym group members for analysis, based on CL etc. 18.11.2003. CH ／

bibl.title: Woerterbuch der Philosophie. Neue Beitraege zu einer Kritik der Sprache

sense.def: keep control over, exercise control over contextually determinate objects
make submit to one's will, control, keep control over; order about
gain control of (oneself) See also WIN
gain control over the contextually determinate N

entry.def: The most current general word in this group is zhì 制 (ant. zòng 縱 "give free rein to"), which refers to all kinds of control, political, physical, as well as psychological.

sense.def: effective political control; effective control (over horses)
dominate systematically; have and keep effective and systematic control of; exercise political control over; organise occasionally inchoative; gain control over
control people, keep control over people
執法之人"a people controlled by laws": be controlled by N
be in a key position with respect to N; have a decissive influence on N
be in control of, be in effective charge of

entry.def: Zhuān 專 refers to having sole control, typically of some administrative function. See MONOPOLISE

sense.def: gain political control of; gain the confidence and thus control of

entry.def: Yù 御 refers to the exercise of sovereign unchallenged control over.

sense.def: be under the control of, be controlled by
control and stop the contextually determinate activity or phenomenon
control and stop 《史記·屈原賈生列傳》："懲違改忿兮，抑心而自彊。" 王念孫 《讀書雜志·史記五》："懲，止也；違，恨也。言止其恨，改其忿，抑其心，而自彊勉也。"參見" 懲忿窒欲 "。
control, keep under control; repress; hold down; hold back
have easy control of; have gained easy control of

entry.def: Guǎn 管 and zhǎng 掌 refer to the concrete practical control over something large or small.

sense.def: ZUO Xiang 29: hold the reins of control over;
take control over; take the post of
handle with skill; wield effective control over

entry.def: Shàn 擅 refers to gaining or having unlegitimised sole control of something. See MONOPOLISE

sense.def: gain sole control of (with no negative connotations); have sole control of
control and keep straight order in, keep in proper shape; get into proper shape
control (oneself) properly (difficult to distinguish from the corresponding item in CORRECT)
the proper sorting out of N

entry.def: Zhì 治 refers to the orderly and principled long-term control of something.

sense.def: control (perhaps prototypically water and rivers; breath, emotions, or the mind), order properly, deal with efficiently
take political charge of; get to deal with
to manage; to control; to regulate; to direct
control so as to prevent (oneself) from transgression
be properly adjusted, be well balanced

entry.def: Guǎn 管 and zhǎng 掌 refer to the concrete practical control over something large or small.

sense.def: manipulate, manage, take care of; control, be in control of
control and adjust the "tuning" of the contextually determinate practice
bestraddle so as to be in control of, exercise power over ??
deal with the contextually determinate N, successfully manage the contextually determinate N
take charge of a contextually determinate thing
control, administer, regulate; constrain and control
be uniquely controlled, be controlled single-handedly

bibl.title: 唐五代語言詞典 Táng Wǔdài yǔyán cídiǎn A Dictionary of the Language of the Tang and Five Dynasties Periods

sense.def: try to control; meddle in 不聞不問
take care of; take responsibility for
to fend off N and have it under control
(= cái 裁) control effectively to one's profit
get under systematic control, reduce to submission
be controlled by; get controlled by
